commenter_a: Getting married doesn't automatically entitle you to gifts or money, your guests will give what they can, if they can but surely their attendance is more important than receiving things from them? Equating the whole situation of gift/money giving to 'living in sin' is so ridiculous and the amount of times people are directly cursed out is excessive. If you wanted to express your opinion so badly, you should have learned how to write first. Bridezilla!
post_message: These people often fall in the same group as elitist jerks who think getting a dress from David's Bridal is "tacky."
